member.name: T:Bme680Driver.Bme680
member.summary: Temperature, humidity, pressure and gas resistance sensor Bme680.

member.name: F:Bme680Driver.Bme680.DefaultI2cAddress
member.summary: The default I2c address of the Bme680.

member.name: F:Bme680Driver.Bme680.SecondaryI2cAddress
member.summary: The secondary I2c address of the Bme680.

member.name: P:Bme680Driver.Bme680.Temperature
member.summary: Temperature in degrees Celsius.

member.name: P:Bme680Driver.Bme680.Humidity
member.summary: Relative humidity.

member.name: P:Bme680Driver.Bme680.Pressure
member.summary: Pressure in Pascal.

member.name: P:Bme680Driver.Bme680.GasResistance
member.summary: Gets the last measured gas resistance in Ohm from the corresponding register.

member.name: P:Bme680Driver.Bme680.HeaterIsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the heater is enabled.

member.name: P:Bme680Driver.Bme680.GasConversionIsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether gas conversions are enabled.

member.name: P:Bme680Driver.Bme680.NewDataIsAvailable
member.summary: Indicates whether new data is available.

member.name: P:Bme680Driver.Bme680.GasMeasurementInProcess
member.summary: Indicates whether a gas measurement is in process.

member.name: P:Bme680Driver.Bme680.MeasurementInProcess
member.summary: Indicates whether a measurement is in process.

member.name: P:Bme680Driver.Bme680.GasMeasurementIsValid
member.summary: Indicates whether a real gas conversion was performed (i.e. not a dummy one).

member.name: P:Bme680Driver.Bme680.HeaterIsStable
member.summary: Indicates whether the target heater temperature was reached.

member.name: P:Bme680Driver.Bme680.CurrentHeaterProfile
member.summary: Gets or sets the heater profile to be used for the next measurement.

member.name: P:Bme680Driver.Bme680.FilterCoefficient
member.summary:
Gets or sets the IIR filter to the given coefficient.
The IIR filter affects temperature and pressure measurements but not humidity and gas measurements.
An IIR filter can suppress disturbances (e.g. slamming of a door or wind blowing in the sensor).

member.name: P:Bme680Driver.Bme680.TemperatureSampling
member.summary: Gets or sets the temperature sampling.

member.name: P:Bme680Driver.Bme680.HumiditySampling
member.summary: Gets or sets the humidity sampling.

member.name: P:Bme680Driver.Bme680.PressureSampling
member.summary: Gets or sets the pressure sampling.

member.name: M:Bme680Driver.Bme680.#ctor(System.Device.I2c.I2cDevice)
member.summary: Temperature, humidity, pressure and gas resistance sensor Bme680.

member.name: M:Bme680Driver.Bme680.InitDevice
member.summary: Initializes the BMP680 sensor, making it ready for use.

member.name: M:Bme680Driver.Bme680.TriggerSoftReset
member.summary: Triggers a soft reset on the device which has the same effect as power-on reset.

member.name: M:Bme680Driver.Bme680.PerformMeasurement
member.summary: Performs a measurement by setting the sensor to forced mode, awaits the result.

member.name: M:Bme680Driver.Bme680.SetPowerMode(Bme680Driver.PowerMode)
member.summary: Sets the power mode to the given mode.

member.name: M:Bme680Driver.Bme680.ReadPowerMode
member.summary: Reads the current power mode the device is running in.

member.name: M:Bme680Driver.Bme680.GetProfileDuration(Bme680Driver.HeaterProfile)
member.summary: Gets the required time in ms to perform a measurement with the given heater profile. The precision of this duration is within 1ms of the actual measurement time.

member.name: M:Bme680Driver.Bme680.SaveHeaterProfileToDevice(Bme680Driver.HeaterProfile,System.UInt16,System.UInt16,System.Double)
member.summary: Sets a gas-sensor-heater profile. Converts the target temperature and duration to internally used format.
member.param: The selected profile to save to.
The target temperature in °C. Ranging from 0-400.
The duration in ms. Ranging from 0-4032.

member.name: M:Bme680Driver.Bme680.GetHeaterProfileFromDevice(Bme680Driver.HeaterProfile)
member.summary: Gets the specified gas-sensor-heater configuration.
member.returns: The configuration of the chosen set-point or null if invalid set-point was chosen.

member.name: M:Bme680Driver.Bme680.ReadTemperature
member.summary: Reads the temperature from the sensor.

member.name: M:Bme680Driver.Bme680.ReadPressure
member.summary: Reads the pressure from the sensor.

member.name: M:Bme680Driver.Bme680.ReadHumidity
member.summary: Reads the humidity from the sensor.

member.name: M:Bme680Driver.Bme680.ReadGasResistance
member.summary: Reads the gas resistance from the sensor.

member.name: M:Bme680Driver.Bme680.CalculateTemperature(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Calculates the temperature in °C.
member.param: The temperature value read from the device.

member.name: M:Bme680Driver.Bme680.CalculatePressure(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Returns the pressure in Pa.
member.param: The pressure value read from the device.

member.summary: Disposes the Bme680 resources.
